properties.value: Struts are the waterwheels of Motherlode Mine, which power the water wheels that cause water to flow around in a loop. There are two struts powering the water flow. They commonly break, and if both struts are broken, the water flow will stop. This stops all pay dirt from being processed and delivered to the sack until both struts are repaired.

SMW Subobject for FunctionalImage: File:Strut.pngObject ID: 26669Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Strut
SMW Subobject for BrokenImage: File:Broken strut.pngObject ID: 26670Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Strut

Struts are the waterwheels of Motherlode Mine, which power the water wheels that cause water to flow around in a loop. There are two struts powering the water flow. They commonly break, and if both struts are broken, the water flow will stop. This stops all pay dirt from being processed and delivered to the sack until both struts are repaired.

Repairing the struts requires clicking on them, while in possession of a hammer, yielding 1.5 times the player's current Smithing level in Smithing experience. Repairing a broken strut is a task in the easy Falador Diary. Hopping worlds to only repair struts yields between 18,000–30,000 Smithing experience per hour, which is common for Ironman mode accounts.

Repair chance[edit | edit source]

The chance of successfully repairing a strut on each successive roll is 12% at level 1 Smithing and 27% at level 99.[1]

'''Struts''' are the waterwheels of [[Motherlode Mine]], which power the water wheels that cause water to flow around in a loop. There are two struts powering the water flow. They commonly break, and if both struts are broken, the water flow will stop. This stops all [[pay dirt]] from being processed and delivered to the sack until both struts are repaired.

Repairing the struts requires clicking on them, while in possession of a [[hammer]], yielding 1.5 times the player's current [[Smithing]] level in Smithing [[experience]]. Repairing a broken strut is a task in the [[easy Falador Diary]]. Hopping worlds to only repair struts yields between 18,000–30,000 Smithing experience per hour, which is common for [[Ironman mode]] accounts.
